Combo Handler History
=====================

0.1.3 (2011-10-31)
------------------

* Use Cluster instead of Spark2.


0.1.2 (2011-07-11)
------------------

* Chasing the latest Express and Connect versions again.


0.1.1 (2011-04-12)
------------------

* Now works with latest Express (2.x) and Connect (1.x).


0.1.0 (2011-02-05)
------------------

* Initial release.
